description: Try our easy to follow Rainbow Lentil Meatballs With Arrabiatta Sauce recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Rainbow Lentil Meatballs With Arrabiatta Sauce
name: Rainbow Lentil Meatballs With Arrabiatta Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place the pasta and meatballs on 4 plates, top with the sauce, and serve immediately. Sprinkle with plant-based Parmesan cheese, if you like.
